title: Saturday Night Live font
content: Can anyone tell me what big, bold font being used on SNL as of late?
author: zigavoo

comments.content:
[http://www.typophile.com/node/33440](http://web.archive.org/web/20120416113345/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33440 "http://www.typophile.com/node/33440")
